concept.title: What is Daily Review?
concept.shortdesc: Understanding the spaced repetition review system for long-term retention.

section.title: Overview
section.p: Daily Review is a flashcard-style practice system that helps you retain the audio slices you've created. It uses spaced repetition to schedule reviews at optimal intervals.

section.title: How It Works
section.p: The system is based on the Leitner box method:

ul.li: Box 1 - New or forgotten cards, reviewed daily
Box 2-5 - Cards move up when answered correctly, reviewed less frequently
Forgot - Cards drop back to Box 1 for more practice
Audio playback - Listen to the original slice audio
Answer - The original English text, revealed on demand

section.title: When to Review
section.p: Cards become "due" based on their box level and last review date. The Review Board shows all due cards for today, allowing you to complete your daily practice in one session.
